html:
Unlimited Wishes: The Classic-looking Online Slot Game with Modern Touch

Get ready to experience the classic look of an old-school slot machine with a modern twist in Unlimited Wishes from Evoplay. Don't let the traditional 3x3 structure fool you - this game packs a punch with its innovative design and promising features for 2021.

With an impressive RTP of 96%, five paylines, and low volatility, this slot has quickly become one of the most fascinating titles from the software house. It's like rubbing a genie's lamp and getting all your wishes granted (except for the million dollar jackpot, sorry folks).

Unleashing The Genie-sis: Unlimited Wishes

If you're looking for a slot game with a unique, magical twist, look no further than Unlimited Wishes! This online slot machine is packed with all the classic fruit slot machine symbols like cherries, lemons, plums, grapes, watermelons, lucky number 7s, and of course, the ever-important genie lamp and genie himself.

Speaking of the genie, he's the highest-paid symbol in Unlimited Wishes, so make sure to rub that lamp and make your wishes count! But even beyond the symbols, Unlimited Wishes shines with its graphics. The minimalist layout draws the focus entirely on the gameplay, and the screen rendering makes playing on mobile or desktop a breeze.

So come take a chance on Unlimited Wishes— who knows, maybe it'll be your genie-sis moment!

Unleash the Magic: Special Features for Winning Combinations

As we enter the magical realm of Unlimited Wishes, things start getting exciting! The game features a Wild symbol that's always on your side, replacing all other symbols to give you more winning combinations. No need to rub any lamps!

But wait, there's more! Get at least two of the three reels filled with the same symbols, and voila! The Respin function and Infinity Magic are activated! It's like winning free genie tickets!

The Respin function rewards players with an extra chance to win big. And with Infinity Magic, players unlock a bonus game that features a random multiplier that can be as low as 2x or as high as 12x. That's more magic than a Hogwarts feast!

Unleash the Magic with Infinity Magic Feature in Unlimited Wishes Slot Game

Gather around folks, because Unlimited Wishes has a feature that's as rare as a unicorn sighting. The Infinity Magic feature will only show up when you've got a screen filled with identical symbols. Yes, you heard that right, you gotta catch 'em all.

But once you do, brace yourselves for a bonus game with a random multiplier that is sure to make your head spin. This feature can send your winnings sky-high and leave you with a grin bigger than the genie himself.

Final Thoughts on 'Unlimited Wishes' Slot Game: Rub the Lamp and Score Big!

Unlimited Wishes is the genie-us creation that keeps on giving. I mean, who doesn't love rubbing the lamp and winning big? With its impressive Respin feature, Wild tiles, and lucrative multipliers, this game is the real deal. But let's talk about the Infinity Magic - it's like the Golden Goose of the game!

Overall, Unlimited Wishes is the perfect choice for savvy gamers who enjoy straightforward gameplay with big rewards. It's so easy to play, you'll feel like you're floating on a magic carpet ride - just watch your bankroll! So, don't let this game slip through your fingers like sand - give it a spin and let the good times roll.

FAQ

How many paylines does Unlimited Wishes have?

Unlimited Wishes has five paylines.

What is the RTP of Unlimited Wishes?

The RTP of Unlimited Wishes is fixed at 96%.

What is the volatility rate of Unlimited Wishes?

Unlimited Wishes has a low volatility rate.

What is the highest-paying symbol in Unlimited Wishes?

The highest-paying symbol in Unlimited Wishes is the genie himself.

What is the Respin feature in Unlimited Wishes?

The Respin feature is a reward that is attributed to the player when at least two of the three reels are filled with the same symbols.

What is the Infinity Magic feature in Unlimited Wishes?

The Infinity Magic feature is unlocked only if all the reels are full of the same symbols and a bonus game is assigned that boasts a random multiplier that can be equal to 2x, 3x, 4x, 6x, 8, or 12x.

What is the Wild symbol in Unlimited Wishes?

The Wild symbol is an icon that replaces all the symbols of the base game to favor the formation of winning combinations.

Does Unlimited Wishes have distracting animations?

No, Unlimited Wishes keeps the entertainment clean by focusing entirely on the gameplay action. There are no particular distractions, animations, or frills.

What we like

  • High RTP of 96%
  • Innovative and promising release for 2021
  • Low volatility and 5 paylines
  • Effective functionalities through simplicity

What we don't like

  • The game theme might be too traditional for some players
  • Only one bonus game could be a downside for those who like bigger games
meta_title: Play Unlimited Wishes for Free - Review of Online Slot Game
meta_desc: Read our review of Unlimited Wishes online slot game and play it for free. Features, gameplay, and design, we've covered everything for you.
